title: Fragment, late 16th–early 17th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: cut and uncut supplementary warp pile (velvet)
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Fragment of green cut and uncut velvet on an orange-tan ground. Surface broken up into eight-sided spaces, each enclosing a tiny flowering branch.
